description: There were some minor slips, but the performers' exuberance lifted the evening. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: re:Sound Collective delivers energetic show under violinist Carla Leurs’ leadership
title_page: Concert review: re:Sound Collective delivers energetic show under violinist Carla Leurs’ leadership | The Straits Times
